event.title: located at the corner of Shedden Road and Harbour Drive is now

data.event: The former Old Courts Building located at the corner of Shedden Road and Harbour Drive is now the National Museum of Grand Cayman.

event.title: was built more than 150 years ago

data.event: The building was built more than 150 years ago and has served the Caymanian government not only as a court building but as a jail and the island's first official Post Office.
